title: [NGMobile] [Q1/25] Technical Enabler - New Optimized Mobile Business Order Process
description:
Description
  Situation as is
Today we have multiple ways to order a new mobile contract with our without a device.  The process is implemented in BSP, GK Portal and MBSP differently. Only in MBSP we have first functionalities that support easy booking and sales recommendations. The checkout is running via 3 different ways and is not always automated.
Users have the opportunity to book orders again, like they already ordered before. That helps but does not supply additional sales or easy overview of what is for free.
Not all mobile products are supported in each order process.
Optimized generic New Mobile Business Order Process content:
The optimized generic new mobile business order process supports the user in a completly new way to order mobile products:
one order process and checkout for all products including Business Flex, Business Mobil, Devices, Mobile Solutions, Business Plan, NEMO and connected Options
the user gets the first version of personnalized or customer specific recommendations to enable easy upsell
open, to be validated: we add accessories recommendations connected to the specific selected device
the user has an easy to understand view on tariffs and options that supports easy selction and booking. It is clearly visible what is feee and what is additionally charged
the user gets specific reommendations if he e.g. selects a multisim that is charged in his selected tariff, but is free in a higher tariff 
all customer individually negotiated prices are displayed
the portal decides by rights and roles if the user shall see a customer or professional (internal users) mode
this is developed in initiative Internal Role MBSP
the order can be parked or forwarded to a different person for release  
OPEN COMMERCIAL DECISION and so far not part of the EPIC: additionally implementation of ratenkauf and leasing
  Capability Overview:
Product Catalog (Supports all kind of products like tariffs, devices & accessories)
Business Processes: New business & ContractProlongation (to be discussed if that is one or 2 microfrontends)
GSP (for upsell recommendations)
ShoppingCart
Checkout

business_impact.cost_saving: Effizienzsteigerung durch Vereinheitlichung von drei verschiedenen Bestellprozessen
business_impact.risk_loss: Reduzierung von Umsatzverlusten durch verbesserte Produktempfehlungen
business_impact.justification: Der neue Prozess ermöglicht personalisierte Empfehlungen und Upselling-Möglichkeiten, die im aktuellen System fehlen. Die Vereinheitlichung der drei verschiedenen Bestellprozesse (BSP, GK Portal, MBSP) reduziert Komplexität und Betriebskosten.

strategic_enablement.risk_minimization: Reduzierung des Risikos von verpassten Verkaufschancen
strategic_enablement.strat_enablement: Strategische Vereinheitlichung aller Mobilfunkprodukte in einem Bestellprozess
strategic_enablement.justification: Der neue Prozess unterstützt alle Mobilfunkprodukte in einem einheitlichen System, was aktuell nicht der Fall ist. Die klare Darstellung von kostenlosen und kostenpflichtigen Optionen sowie kundenspezifischen Preisen verbessert die strategische Positionierung.

time_criticality.justification: Die aktuelle fragmentierte Implementierung in verschiedenen Systemen ist nicht zukunftsfähig. Die Vereinheitlichung und Verbesserung des Bestellprozesses ist wichtig, um mit Marktstandards Schritt zu halten.

footnotes: Bezugszeitraum ist 12 Monate nach Launch für neue/zusätzliche Umsatzerlöse
Kosten für Risiken = Schadenshöhe x Eintrittswahrscheinlichkeit
